actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise the eligibility requirement for the receipt of a headstone or marker for veterans whose remains are unrecoverable.

summary.text: Removes the requirement that a veteran die in the service in order to be entitled to a memorial headstone or marker when his remains have not been recovered or identified or have been buried at sea.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise the eligibility requirement for the receipt of a headstone or marker for veterans whose remains are unrecoverable.
